TopicTitle: How to get rid of "Grab", "Board", etc.?

Articles.Content:
Trying to record a video without a HUD, but these prompts keep showing whenever Kerbals are either next to the ladders or the hatches.

Thanks!
As far as I know, you can't.
Don't go next to ladders or hatches?

I've wondered about this myself when making KSP movies. F2 hides the HUD but all the targets and things like what the original poster mentioned remain visible. Wish there were some sort of option to turn those off but completely understand that would be so far down on a dev list of to-do's that it wouldn't even merit attention. We can hope though
